Uses of Interface
eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.IScanner

  • Packages that use IScanner 
    Package Description
    eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner
    Provides scanners for several languages that can be obtained in a strict or in a lenient variant.

    • Uses of IScanner in eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner

      Subinterfaces of IScanner in eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ILenientScanner
      Lenient scanner that, in contrast to IScanner, does not throw ScannerExceptions for unrecognized characters, but returns tokens of token class ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR and resumes scanning.
      Classes in eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner that implement IScanner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StrictScanner
      Wrapps an ILenientScanner and converts tokens of ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR into ScannerExceptions.
      Methods in eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner that return IScanner 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IScanner ScannerFactory.newScanner(ELanguage language, File file)
      Create a new strict scanner for a file.
      static IScanner ScannerFactory.newScanner(ELanguage language, Reader reader, String originId)
      Create a new strict scanner that uses the specified reader.
      static IScanner ScannerFactory.newScanner(ELanguage language, String input, String originId)
      Create a new strict scanner that scans a string.
      static IScanner ScannerFactory.strict(ILenientScanner scanner)
      Wraps an ILenientScanner scanner with a StrictScanner.
      Methods in eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner with parameters of type IScanner 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ScannerUtils.readTokens(IScanner scanner, List<IToken> tokens, List<ScannerException> exceptions)
      Read tokens from a strict scanner and store them in a list.
      Constructors in eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner with parameters of type IScanner 
      Constructor and Description
      SyntaxHighlightingViewFactory(IScanner scanner, HashMap<eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.ETokenType.ETokenClass,Color> colorMap, HashMap<eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.ETokenType.ETokenClass,Integer> styleMap)
      Create new view factory.
